name: Contemporary Amperex Technology GmbH
goal: providing effective solutions for global new energy applications in electric vehicles (EV) and energy storage systems (ESS) with advanced battery technology. It features R&D and manufacturing capabilities as well as core technologies of completed industrial chain about materials, cell, battery system and battery recycling.
euInitiatives:
(1) The business of the Company is providing engineering services in the field of electrical energy storage devices for both stationary and transport applications and the distribution of those services and products.
(2) The Company shall be entitled to enter into any and all business transactions and take any and all measures which seem to be necessary or useful to achieve the objects of the Company.
